[Switch Tales of Vesperia REMASTER Gold Hands]
[Switch legend REMASTER Ver 1.0.1 gold finger]
[By Lu Yi Niang original weibo/ruisan or ruimusume.blog.jp]



[Full level after the whole battle (affecting the game experience with caution)]
